projects.title: My world map
projects.description: This is a world map I created for myself and my Dungeons & Dragons games. It was first hand-drawn on A3 paper and then scanned and worked on digitally. Every place has history and a story to tell, a lot of unique encounters and interesting things to see.

projects.title: Dragon
projects.description: An elegant beast/dragon I drew on paper. One of three prime dieties in my world which can be seen above.

projects.title: Dragonhead
projects.description: This was a random sketch I drew on a pen display.

projects.title: Baby dragon
projects.description: A baby dragon I drew with pens on paper.

projects.title: Birdbrute
projects.description: A species I use for my world. They are riding beasts and used for heavy labour. The Birdbrutes are strong and pack a hard punch with their claws.

projects.title: Aurum Argentum
projects.description: A city in my world called Aurum Argentum, where most live a fairly prosperous life. Drawn on paper with pens and colored pencils.

projects.title: Devilgirl
projects.description: This was my first real attempt at drawing a humanoid figure on a pen display.

projects.title: Chibi style
projects.description: An experiment with the chibi style and trying out some new fun ways to work in a digital medium.

projects.title: A new species
projects.description: A concept I created some years back of some kind of animal or alien/fantasy creature.
